comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200412011139

I don't have exact steps to reproduce this, but i can give a quick rundown on
what i was doing at the time.

1. searched for a declaring extension point (it is still active in my search view).
2. renamed both the plugin name and the target namespace of the declared plugin.
 3. closed then re-opened the extension point
